name: @msinternal/isomorphic-react-dom
description: Exports window.ReactDOM if available, otherwise, exports require('react-dom').

scripts.build: npm run --if-present build:pre && npm run build:run && npm run --if-present build:post
scripts.build:run: npm run build:run:babel && npm run build:run:webpack && touch ./package.json
scripts.bump: vg bump prod && vg bump dev && (npm audit fix || exit 0)

author: Microsoft Corporation
